goal.en: “Instruct students to learn the techuiques and theories of survival analysis, and understand the practice of medical and biological research.“
goal.ch: “使學生具備處理存活資料分析相關理論方法的技巧與能力,並對於生物醫學相關研究有所瞭解 .“

content.en:
“1. Introduction to basic survival analysis, Chapter1＆ 2.
2. Discussion of censoring and truncation, likelihood construction and development of maximum likelihood method for making inferences. Chapter 3.
3. Regression analysis of survival data based on accelerated failure time model. Discussion of parametric and nonparametric versions of the model. Chapter 12.
4. Nonparametric inference for survival and and hazard function based on single sample data. Chapter 4, 6 and 7
5. Proportional hazard model including discussion of partial likelihood. Chapter 8 and 9.
6. Methods for determining parametric and nonparametric model adequacy. Chapter 11.“
content.ch:
“1. Introduction to basic survival analysis, Chapter1＆ 2.
2. Discussion of censoring and truncation, likelihood construction and development of maximum likelihood method for making inferences. Chapter 3.
3. Regression analysis of survival data based on accelerated failure time model. Discussion of parametric and nonparametric versions of the model. Chapter 12.
4. Nonparametric inference for survival and and hazard function based on single sample data. Chapter 4, 6 and 7
5. Proportional hazard model including discussion of partial likelihood. Chapter 8 and 9.
6. Methods for determining parametric and nonparametric model adequacy. Chapter 11.“

textbook.en: “Textbook : Survival analysis., by Klein and Moeschberger, ISBN : 0387948295 Reference book: 1. Applied survival analysis, by Hosmer and Lemeshow , ISBN : 0471154105 2. Modeling survival data, by Therneau and Grambsch ISBN : 0387987843 3. The statistical analysis of failure time data 2nd Ed., by Kalbfleisch and Prentice. ISBN: 047136357x“
textbook.ch: “Textbook : Survival analysis., by Klein and Moeschberger, ISBN : 0387948295 Reference book: 1. Applied survival analysis, by Hosmer and Lemeshow , ISBN : 0471154105 2. Modeling survival data, by Therneau and Grambsch ISBN : 0387987843 3. The statistical analysis of failure time data 2nd Ed., by Kalbfleisch and Prentice. ISBN: 047136357x“

method.en: Lecture Seminar Practical Training Lab Individual Instruction
method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗 個別指導

grading.en: “Homework 40％ Midterm or project 30％ Final Project exam 30％“
grading.ch: “Homework 40％ Midterm or project 30％ Final Project exam 30％“

en: Type:Undergraduate Program only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementST6038 only.With an average of 70 or above for Required Subjects.
ch: 學制:限學士班。指定課程:必須先修ST6038。且檢定指定課程平均成績達70分以上。
